item.title: MS will "outsmart" Linux
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Ballmer is clueless about open source. They actually think the MVPs are going to equate to open source coders? Ever meet an MVP? A businessman (Ballmer) will never understand what is about open source that is attractive. When all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail. When you are a businessman, everything looks like a dollar.
